text:
Doctor Goh is very knowledgeable and generous with his advice and help. He has provided the necessary information and hope to help my knee heal. The staff Mdm Waiyin is also very helpful and flexible at arranging the schedule.

Overall great experience and pleasant people to work with.

I'll highlight recommend going for a session.

Great experience!
I've been to see Dr. Goh, a few times now for both corrective and preventative reasons, he has taken the time to explain the treatments and any potential issues I may have.  I am glad to say they have all been a success.
Highly recommend.

I have been treated for many medical ailments for many years and have always recovered well.  Dr Goh has wide and deep knowledge of medicines and well versed in its practice. He is thorough in his protocol and treatment.

I recently visited this orthopaedics clinic and had an excellent experience. The staff was professional and welcoming. Dr. Chris took time to thoroughly explain my condition and treatment options, answering all my questions patiently. The clinic was clean, modern, and well-equipped, and I appreciated the efficient scheduling and minimal wait times.

Dr GOH IS VERY PATIENCE and kind. He gives you the confidence and makes you feel that soon you will  be ok.
He took care of my broken leg bones and toes without having  to put cast and managed to avoid surgery.
